channel.title: Gradle on Jarvis`s library
channel.description: Recent content in Gradle on Jarvis`s library

item.title: gradle笔记
item.description:
编译打包时，将依赖也打入jar包，在build.gradle文件中，添加这一部分即可

jar {
    from {
        configurations.runtime.collect { zipTree(it) }
    }
    enabled = true
}

去除依赖：

    compile('com.ebay.fount:managed-fount-client:0.1.1') {
        exclude group: 'com.ebay.platform.security', module: 'trustfabric-client'
    }
